name: Acid-Tooth Dagger
desc: weapon,melee,dagger,bone. Paired. On a Perfect Hit, a wound attempt in your attack automatically succeeds.

name: Adventure Sword
desc: sword,finesse. Unique, Irreplaceable. Add courage to weapon's strength

name: Amber Edge
desc: scimitar, amber. Slow. At the end of each attack, if you wounded the monster, make an additional attack with this weapon. (Note that this is *attack* not *attack roll*.)

name: Amber Poleaxe
desc: weapon,axe,spear, 2H, amber. Reach 2. When a monster collides with you, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster suffers 1 wound.

name: Anklebiter Axe
desc: weapon,melee,axe,bone. Paired. Each time you critically wound with this weapon, the monster gains a -1 movement token.

name: Ankleslicer Sword
desc: weapon,melee,sword,bone. Paired. Each time you critically wound with this weapon, the monster gains a -1 movement token.

name: Arc Bow
desc: bow,2H. Slow, Range 6. Cumbersome - spend move+action to activate. 0.5-aff-red/0.5-aff-green/1-aff-blue = range +2

name: Arm of the First Tree
desc: weapon,melee,club. On a Perfect Hit, the monster gains a -1 Toughness token until the end of the round (max 1x/round).
obtained: The Messenger of the First Story encounter
material: Can only be made after the encounter, and then requires defeating a Lonely Tree to make another.

name: Barbed Arrows
desc: arrow,bow. Arrow-bow. These upgrade all normal bow shots by adding +1 strength.

name: Beacon Shield
desc: 1/6/5. Block 2: spend move to ignore 2 hits next time you are attacked (up until your next act). You cannot block more than once per attack. Shield adds +2 armor to all locations.

name: Beast Knuckle
desc: katar,bone. Paired. When you wound with this weapon, monster gains -1 toughness until end of this attack.

name: Beetle Eye Shield
desc: 2/7+/3 The shield has a myriad of eyes on the front to confuse the opponent. If a trap hit location card is drawn during your attacks, discard it and draw another hit location card. 1x/attack and costs 1 survival to perform. Block 1.
material: 1x scarab shell, 1x compound eye, 1x web silk

name: Biting Visage
desc: 2/7+/4 weapon,shield. Block 1. If holding this shield during an attack (with any weapon) and draw a Trap, roll 1d10. On 6+ the visage distracts the monster and you may discard the trap card (but do not draw a new HL card).

name: Black Sword
desc: weapon,melee,sword,heavy. On a Perfect Hit, gain +1 survival. If you are a Sword Master, you understand this weapons potential. It gains +20 strength.

name: Blast Shield
desc: 1/7+/4 weapon,melee,shield,metal. Block 1. The first time you block a hit each showdown, gain the priority target token. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.

name: Blast Sword
desc: weapon,melee,sword,bone. Block 1. When you block with this weapon, gain +1 survival.

name: Bone Axe
desc: weapon,melee,axe,bone. Frail. Savage: 1/attack, if you critically wound, cause 1 additional wound. Does not apply to impervious hit locations.

name: Bone Blade
desc: weapon,melee,sword,bone. Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive the card at the END of the attack.

name: Bone Dagger
desc: weapon,melee,dagger,bone. On a Perfect Hit, gain +1 survival.

name: Bone Darts
desc: weapon,ranged,thrown,bone. Range: 6. Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive the card at the END of the attack.

name: Bone Pickaxe
desc: item,tool,bone. Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive the card at the END of the attack. After Hunt Phase setup, place Mineral Gathering event on any hunt space.

name: Bone Sickle
desc: item,tool,bone. Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive the card at the END of the attack. After Hunt Phase setup, place Herb Gathering event on any hunt space.

name: Butcher Cleaver
desc: weapon,melee,axe,other. Paired. Sentient: must be insane to activate. Irreplaceable: When you die, archive this weapon.

name: Calcified Digging Claw
desc: melee,katar,pickaxe. Paired, Sharp. During the Mineral Gathering story event, you may reroll one of your d10. This item acts as a pickaxe.

name: Calcified Juggernaut Blade
desc: melee,grand,bone,other. Slow, Block 1. This weapon gains +1 strength for each token you have.

name: Calcified Zanbato
desc: melee,grand,2H,bone,heavy. Slow, Deadly. 1x 1-aff-green = Gains Devastating 1.

name: Cat Fang Knife
desc: weapon,melee,dagger,bone. 3-aff-red = on a perfect hit gain +1 strength token. When knocked down, remove all +1 strength tokens.

name: Cat Gut Bow
desc: weapon,ranged,bow,2H. Range: 6. Cumbersome - spend move+action to fire weapon.

name: Celestial Spear
desc: weapon,melee,spear,metal. Reach 2. Gain +5 strength when attacking with this weapon if you have a constellation.

name: Claw Head Arrow
desc: item,ammunition,bow,arrow. Slow, requires a bow. If you hit, monster gains -1 evasion token. Usable 1x/showdown.

name: Counterweighted Axe
desc: weapon,melee,axe,2H. Reach 2. 0.5-aff-red = on a perfect hit, do not draw a hit location (monster suffers 1 wound).

name: Denticle Axe
desc: melee,axe,scale. 1x 1-aff-blue / 1x 1-aff-red = When attacking from the blind spot, the attack gains +2 strength and the first successful wound attempt gains Devastating 1.
material: 1x 1,000 year sunspot, 1x salt, 1x black lens, 1x iron, 1x bone

name: Digging Claw
desc: melee,katar,pickaxe,bone,mineral. Paired. During the Mineral Gathering story event, you may reroll one of your d10. Acts as a pickaxe.

name: Dragon Bite Bolt
desc: item,ammunition,arrow. Slow, Ammo-Bow, Devastating 1. If you wound the monster, it suffers knockback 5. Use 1x/showdown per gear card.

name: Dragon Chakram
desc: weapon,ranged,thrown,bone. Range: 3. If you hit, the monster gains -1 evasion until the end of the round. Limit, 1x/attack.

name: Dragon Slayer
desc: weapon,melee,grand,2H,heavy,metal. Frail, Slow, Sharp, Devastating 1. Early iron: when an attack roll is a 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Feather Shield
desc: 3/7/0 weapon. Block 1. 1-aff-green/1-aff-blue/1-aff-red = reduce any suffered brain damage by 1, to min of 1. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.

name: Finger of God
desc: weapon,melee,spear,2H. Reach 2. 1-aff-green/1-aff-blue/1-aff-red = if you have +5 survival then gain +1 accuracy and +1 strength.

name: Fist and Tooth
desc: fistandtooth, fist and tooth. +1 luck when attacking with this weapon.

name: Founding Stone
desc: weapon,melee,stone. Spend action to sling stone for 1 auto-hit and critical wound, then archive the weapon.

name: Gaxe
desc: weapon,melee,axe,bone. Each showdown, the first time you critically wound the monster, it gains -1 evasion token. 1x 1-aff-red = Gains +1 speed and Savage.

name: Giant Stone Face
desc: grand,2H,stone. Devastating 1. If your attack roll result is a 1, archive this card and place a Giant Stone Face terrain tile in any adjacent space. May be picked up after the battle.
material: after that, hug a big damn rock

name: Gloom Hammer
desc: 2H,gloomy,club. Sentient, Reach 2, Deadly. When you wound, end your attack (cancel reactions). Gain the monster controller tile and full move the monster directly away from you.
material: Slenderman event. Requires Dark Research II. 3x skull, 1x iron, 1x organ, 3x dark water

name: Gloom Katana
desc: katana,2H,gloomy,finesse. Your insanity is added to this weapon's strength. When Gloom Sheath is right of this in your gear grid, Gloom Katana gains Savage.
material: Slenderman event. Requires Dark Research III. 1x iron, 1x crystal mold, 2x dark water

name: Gloom-Coated Arrow
desc: arrow,gloomy. Ammo-Bow, Cumbersome, Deadly. After attempting to wound each hit location, place the HL card on top of the deck instad of the discard pile. Use 1x/showdown.
material: Slenderman event. Requires Dark Research I. 2x bone, 1x dark water

name: Greater Gaxe
desc: weapon,melee,axe,2H,heavy. Deadly, Reach 2. 1x 1-aff-green / 1x 1-aff-red = On a Perfect Hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +4 strength for the rest of the attack.

name: Grinning Visage
desc: 2/7+/4 weapon,shield. Block 1.2/7/4. Shield. Block 1. When you wound with this shield, you may spend 1 survival to add 1 armor to all hit locations. Limit 1x/attack.
material: Spidicules, destroy Legless Ball, get shield.

name: Griswaldo
desc: weapon,set,melee,sword,finesse,bone,metal. Sharp, Deadly, Savage. When you wound, Block 2 free if you have Fetorsaurus.
material: Survivor with True Blade fighting art, 1x gormite, 1x stomach lining, 1x calcified juggernaut blade, 1x iron

name: Hazmat Shield
desc: 2/4+/7 weapon,melee,shield,metal,heavy. Block 2. When the monster performs Unseen Agony or Meltdown, roll 1d10. On 2+ you suffer no damage. Shield adds +2 armor to all locations.

name: Hollow Sword
desc: weapon,melee,sword,bone. Frail, Paired. On a perfect hit make 1 additional attack roll.

name: Hollowpoint Arrow
desc: Slow, ammo-bow. On hit, monster gains -1 movement token. Usable 1x/showdown.

name: Hooded Scrap Katar
desc: weapon,melee,katar,metal. Paired. If you hit 4+ times in a single attack with this weapon, the monster suffers 1 wound before hit locations are drawn.

name: Hunter Whip
desc: weapon,melee,whip,leather. 2x 0.5-aff-blue = on a perfect hit, discard one monster mood in play.

name: Ink Blood Bow
desc: 2H,bow. Range: 7, Deadly, Cumbersome. Gains +1 strength for each bleeding token you have. Loses cumbersome when in darkness.
material: 1x 3,000 year sunspot, 5x organ, 3x shadow tentacles, 1x iron

name: Ink Sword
desc: melee,sword,fragile. Reach 3, Deadly 3. You may only attack with this while in darkness.
material: 1x 3,000 year sunspot, 4x hide, 1x shadow ink gland, 1x iron

name: King Spear
desc: spear,heavy, 2H. Reach 2.

name: Knuckle Shield
desc: 3/7+/1 Block 1. Once per round, if you wound with this weapon, Block 1 for free. Shield adds +0 armor to all locations.

name: Lance of Longinus
desc: spear,2H,bone. Irreplaceable, Reach 2. Each showdown, first time you wounds, monster gains -1 toughness token.

name: Lantern Dagger
desc: dagger,finesse,metal. Paired. Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt). Early Iron: when attack roll is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Lantern Glaive
desc: spear,axe,2H,finesse,metal. Reach 2. Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt). Early Iron: when an attack roll is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Lantern Halberd
desc: 2H,spear,other. Reach 2, irreplaceable, unique. After attacking, if standing, you may move up to 2 spaces directly away from monster.
material: lose Guidepost innovation, gain Lantern Halberd

name: Lantern Sword
desc: sword,finesse,metal. Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt). Early Iron: when an attack roll is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Lion Beast Katar
desc: weapon,melee,katar. Deadly (+1 luck with this weapon). Paired: When you attack, add the speed of a 2nd Lion Beast Katar in your gear grid.

name: Lion Knight's Left Claw
desc: Katar. Paired with the LK Right Claw. 1x 0.5-aff-red=Deadly. 1x 0.5-aff-blue=+1 speed

name: Lion Knight's Right Claw
desc: Katar. Paired with the LK Left Claw. 1x 0.5-aff-red=On a perfect hit, gain +1 survival. 1x 0.5-aff-blue=+1 speed

name: Manacles
desc: uses whip profiency. Note that manacles cause no wounds. On a successful wound roll, they lower a monster's movement by 3 (for each successful wound roll). Use Whip Proficiency number for the Strength rather than 0. If a survivor carries manacles during an event where another survivor would leave the group or settlement, roll an attack. On success, they are prevented from leaving.

name: Muramasa
desc: katana,2H,finesse,other. Frail, Sharp, Sentient, Deadly 2, Unique. When you crit wound with this weapon, gain 2 bleeding tokens.

name: Nuclear Knife
desc: weapon,melee,dagger,nuclear. Spend action: Edge ignites! Suffer 3 brain damage. Your next attack with this weapon gains Devastating 1. Limit 1x/round.

name: Nuclear Scythe
desc: weapon,melee,sythe,2H,nuclear. Reach 2. Spend action: Edge ignites! Suffer 3 brain damage. Your next attack with this weapon gains Devastating 1. Limit, 1x/round.

name: Perfect Slayer
desc: grand,sword,2H,heavy,finesse,metal. Slow, Sharp Devastating 2, Irreplaceable, -2 movement.

name: Prism Mace
desc: melee,club,2H,bone. Block 1. When you wound with this, you may Block 1 for free and discard 1 mood in play if you have any +1 strength tokens.
material: 4x iron, 1x shimmering halo, 2x elder cat teeth

name: Rainbow Katana
desc: katana,finesse,2H. Frail. 0.5-aff-red/1-aff-green/1-aff-blue = gains Deadly.
material: heat, 1x phoenix beak, 1x rainbow droppings, 1x iron, 6x bone

name: Ram Prow
desc: 2/6/7 weapon,shield. +2 movement. Block 1. If a move (or dash) is combined with an attack with this shield, then on a successful hit roll 1d10. If the roll is at or below the number of grids moved, then the monster is knocked down. Throw out all HL traps and ignore reactions for the rest of this round.

name: Rawhide Whip
desc: whip,rawhide. Provoke: when you wound with this weapon, gain priority target token.

name: Regal Edge
desc: weapon,melee,sword,metal. Sharp. Gain +1 speed and +4 strength when attacking with this weapon if you have a constellation.

name: Replica Flower Sword
desc: weapon,melee,grand,sword. Devastating 1. You cannot dodge. 2x 1-aff-green / 1x 1-aff-red = Gains Sharp and +1 Evasion.

name: Rib Blade
desc: weapon,melee,grand,bone. Slow, Deadly.

name: Ring Whip
desc: whip,finesse,metal. Sharp, Reach 2. Early Iron: when an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Riot Mace
desc: weapon,melee,club. Deadly. When you critically wound, the next time the monster would draw AI, it performs Basic Action instead.
material: 1x pure bulb, 1x stout kidney, 1x jiggling lard, 1x dense bone

name: Round Leather Shield
desc: 1/8/1 weapon. Block 1: spend action to ignore 1 hit location next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. Max 1 block/attack. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.

name: Scrap Dagger
desc: dagger,metal. On a perfect hit, gain +2 strength for the rest of the attack.

name: Scrap Shield
desc: 2/7/3 weapon. Block 1: spend action to ignore 1 hit location next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. Max 1 block/attack. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.

name: Scrap Sword
desc: sword,metal. On a perfect hit gain +4 strength for the rest of the attack. 2x 1-aff-red/1-aff-blue = gains Deadly.

name: Silk Whip
desc: whip,silk. 1x 0.5-aff-blue / 1x 0.5-aff-green = On a Perfect Hit, you may archive a mood in play instead of drawing a random hit location.

name: Skleaver
desc: 2H,heavy,bone. On the first Perfect Hit each attack, this gainst Devastating 1 until the end of the attack. 2x 1-aff-red / 1x 0.5-aff-red = Loses the heavy keyword.
material: 2x 1,000 year sunspot, 1x salt, 1x black lense, 1x sunshark bone

name: Skullcap Hammer
desc: club,bone. On a perfect hit, monster is dazed and gains -1 speed token until end of its turn. Max -1/round.

name: Sky Harpoon
desc: melee,thrown,spear. Reach 3, Savage. 1x/showdown, if monster is within reach, roll 1d10. On 6+, you skewer it! It suffers 1 wound. Move it up to 3 spaces toward you.

name: Sonic Tomahawk
desc: axe,metal. On a perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll. 0.5-aff-red/2x 1-aff-green/1-aff-blue = gain Savage and Paired.
material: 1x small feathers, 1x scrap, 1x hollow wing bone

name: Steel Shield
desc: 1/6/6 weapon. Irreplaceable. -3 movement. Spend action or 1 survival to ignore a hit. Shield adds +0 armor to all locations.

name: Steel Sword
desc: sword,finesse,metal. Irreplaceable, Slow, Sharp. On perfect hit gain +1d10 strength for the rest of the attack.

name: Sunring Bow
desc: weapon,ranged,2H,bow,bone. Range: 5. Cumbersome. 2x 0.5-aff-red = On a Perfect Hit, do not draw a hit location, monster suffers 1 wound.

name: Sunshark Arrows
desc: Arrow-bow. Sharp (+1d10 strength/wound attempt). Activation Limit 3x/showdown.
material: 3x small sunteeth, 1x bone, 1x sunshark fin, 1x salt

name: Sunshark Bow
desc: weapon,melee,ranged,bow,2H. Sharp, Range: 1. 1x 0.5-aff-red / 2x 1-aff-red = Gaints +4 strength and slow.
material: 2x huge sunteeth, 1x organ, 1x sunshark bone, 1x salt

name: Sunspot Dart
desc: ranged,thrown. Range: 5, Deadly, Activation Limit: 3. When you hit, there is an inspiring flash! Survivors adjacent to the monster gain +1 survival.

name: Talon Knife
desc: weapon,melee,katar,bone. Paired. If all of your attack rolls hit, gain Savage and Deadly until the end of your attack.

name: The Weaver
desc: sword,amber. When you wound a monster, add 1 armor to a random hit location.

name: Throwing Knife
desc: ranged,thrown. Range: 4. At the end of your attack, gain +1 accuracy token for each Perfect Hit. When knocked down, remove all your +1 accuracy tokens.

name: Thunder Maul
desc: club,2H,other. Irreplaceable, Unique, Cursed. On perfect hit monster is knocked down. Suffer a severe arm injury. All non-deaf survivors suffer 1 brain damage.

name: Twilight Sword
desc: twilightsword,2H,finesse,other. Slow, Cursed, Cumbersome, Sentient, Irreplaceable. Gaints Devastating 2 when fighting the Watcher. *Accuracy is (9-Twilight Sword proficiency level), not 10. Can only use Twilight Sword Weapon Proficiency with this weapon.

name: Vespertine Arrow
desc: item,ammunition,arrow. Ammo - Bow. Deadly 4. Archive after use. If your attack misses, place a Flower Patch terrain tile adjacent to the monster.

name: Vespertine Bow
desc: weapon,ranged,bow,2H,other. Range 5, Deadly. NOT CUMBERSOME! Before each attack, you may choose for Vespertine Bow to have slow, +4 accuracy, and Range: 9 for that attack.
material: 1x osseous bloom, 1x sighing bloom, 1x organ, 1x hide. Add Necrotic Mistletoe (FK) event 4 years from now.

name: Vespertine Foil
desc: weapon,melee,sword,fragile. Deadly 2. At the beginning of each settlement phase, archive this unless you spend 1 Flower resource.

name: Whistling Mace
desc: club,bone. On perfect hit, reveal next AI card. Place it on top or bottom of AI deck. Unwieldy: if any attack rolls are 1, you hit your self and suffer 1 damage.

name: Xmaxe
desc: weapon,melee,axe,other. This weapon's strength is equal to your current insanity.

name: Zanbato
desc: grand,2H,bone. Slow, Frail, Deadly (+1 luck). 0.5-aff-red/1-aff-green = Gaints Devastating 1: whenever you wound, inflict 1 additional wound.
